definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: A team decides to tank and rests its best players.
sentences.chinese: 一个球队决定摆烂，轮休他最好的球员。

sentences.english: One or two will be rested. Vela is back.
sentences.chinese: 有几位球员将轮休，不过贝拉回来了。

sentences.english: Non-shift employees should have the right to 20 days' leave for each year of work.
sentences.chinese: 非轮休员工每工作年度应享有20天的假期。

sentences.english: Thierry Henry will be rested for the FA Cup third-round tie with Stoke on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 亨利将在周日的足总杯第三轮对阵斯托克中轮休。

definition: to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
to come back out of retirement/to get involved again after having withdrawn
on stage/to go on stage/to take the field
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
